name: Ben
dialogue: I've been thinking a lot about my childhood lately. It was... complicated.

name: Eva
dialogue: Oh, Ben? What do you mean?

name: Ben
dialogue: Well, my parents were always fighting when I was growing up. It was like this constant background noise that I couldn't escape.

name: Eva
dialogue: *nodding* I can imagine that would be really tough to deal with. Did it affect your self-esteem or how you saw yourself?

name: Ben
dialogue: Yeah, definitely. I always felt like I was the problem, like there was something wrong with me. It took me a long time to realize that they were the ones with the issues, not me.

name: Eva
dialogue: That must have been really hard for you. But you're so intelligent and thoughtful, Ben. You deserve to be happy and content.

name: Ben
dialogue: Thanks, Eva. Just talking about it feels like a weight off my shoulders.
